wikipedia_page.main: Daniel Thomas Greaves (born 31 January 1963) is an English former professional footballer who played as a striker. After retiring as a player, Greaves became a football manager, and managed Witham Town.

response: Steve Tilson now runs a football academy along with former Southend United player Danny Greaves.
* Danny Greaves (footballer) (born 1963), English former professional footballer
